meanings.sent1: I enjoy immixing different colors to create new ones.
meanings.sent2: She was immixing the ingredients to make a delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat was immixing its toys all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush was immixing the vibrant hues on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef's hands moved swiftly, immixing flavors in the pot.

meanings.definition: To blend or combine different elements
meanings.sent1: The DJ was immixing various beats to create a unique sound.
meanings.sent2: The architect was immixing traditional and modern designs in the building.
meanings.sent3: The kids were immixing their toys to make a giant playset.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was immixing humor and seriousness to engage the audience.
meanings.sent5: The potion bubbled as the witch was immixing rare ingredients in her cauldron.
